name: HTML5 Sketch Pad
tagline: An easy-to-use sketch pad with HTML5 and canvas.
body:
### The Point
For quick line doodling and picture sketching in a canvas environment.

### No Clicks
Click in the box, drag out and let go. To continue drawing continuously just move the mouse back inside the box.

### Authors and Contributors
@dcollien and @abethcrane wrote this in 2010 to fiddle with html5 and play around with canvas.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
